tv.name: LG 108cm (43 inch) Full HD LED Smart TV  (43LH576T)
tv.desc: Featuring a Full HD display, this LG smart TV renders all your visuals in high definition. Thanks to its Advanced Magic Remote and Miracast technology, this smart TV lets you connect it to a wide range of smart devices, such as smartphones and tablets. Equipped with a built-in WiFi chip, this LG TV allows you to stream content directly from the Interne
highlights: 20 W Speaker Output : Rich, powerful sound
1920 x 1080 Full HD - Watch Blu-ray movies at their highest level of detail
